name: Synaptic Override
story_text: You control an enemy's nervous system. How pleasant for them.

low.conditions: The target makes a free strike against one enemy of your choice

mid.conditions: The target shifts up to their speed and uses their signature ability against any enemies of your choice

high.conditions: The target moves up to their speed and uses their signature ability against any enemies of your choice

effect: You control the target's movement. The target can't be moved in a way that would harm them (such as over a cliff), leave them dying, or result in them suffering a condition or other negative effect. However, you can move them to provoke opportunity attacks.
special_effect: Strained: You take 1d6 damage and are weakened until the end of your turn.
